Package index

Inverse probability methods

transportIP()
Transportability analysis using IOPW
summary(<transportIP>) print(<summary.transportIP>)
Summarize results of a fitted MSM using the IOPW approach
plot(<transportIP>)
Plot graphs relevant to transportability analysis using IOPW
is.transportIP()
Check validity of IOPW result object

G-computation methods

transportGCPreparedModel()
Prepare an outcome model object for transportGC
is.transportGCPreparedModel()
Check validity of prepared model object for g-computation
transportGC()
Transportability analysis using g-computation
summary(<transportGC>) print(<summary.transportGC>)
Summarize results of transportability analysis using g-computation
plot(<transportGC>)
Visually represent results of transportability analysis using g-computation
is.transportGC()
Check validity of g-computation result object

Target aggregate data adjustment (TADA) methods

transportTADA()
Transportability analysis using TADA
summary(<transportTADA>) print(<summary.transportTADA>)
Summarize results of a fitted MSM using the TADA approach
plot(<transportTADA>)
Plot graphs relevant to transportability analysis using TADA
is.transportTADA()
Check validity of TADA result object

Interpolated g-computation methods

transportInterpolated()
Transportability analysis using interpolated g-computation
summary(<transportInterpolated>) print(<summary.transportInterpolated>)
Summarize results of transportability analysis using interpolated g-computation
plot(<transportInterpolated>)
Visually represent results of transportability analysis using interpolated g-computation
is.transportInterpolated()
Check validity of interpolated g-computation result object

Weight trimming and truncating utilities

trim()
Trimming specification object
trunc()
Truncation specification object
